Title: Requires prescription containers for opioid medications to have a red cap top and a printed warning
Summary: Requires prescription containers for opioid medications to have a red cap top and a printed warning about the risks of overdose and addiction.
LawCode: Amd ยง3331, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring red cap tops with a printed warning for opioid medications
